ingredients.content: 120 g dairy free chocolate, broken into pieces
1 sprig fresh mint leaves, for decorating (optional)

preparations.content: Place chocolate, cocoa powder, almond milk, sugar and salt into mixing bowl and cook <b>2 min/100°C/speed 2<b>, or until chocolate melts. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place tofu into mixing bowl and blend <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>, until smooth. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved chocolate mixture and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>.
Divide mixture between 4 small serving glasses (approx. 150 g) and place into refrigerator to chill (approx. 1 hour). Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place frozen raspberries (optional) into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec//speed 4<b>.
Top each chocolate mousse with raspberry caviar and decorate with mint leaves (optional). Serve immediately.
